alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 16 at 9:55PM EST until December 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the most persistent lake snows, with local amounts of over 2 feet possible where the band persists the longest. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. Greatest snow amounts across southern Erie, western Wyoming, northern and western Chautauqua, and northwest Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times with deep snow cover on roads and poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4285 7833 4303 7817 4310 7840 4307 7862 4299 7895 4279 7890 4251 7942 4248 7937 4264 7872 4276 7855 TIME Y22M12D17T0000Z-Y22M12D17T1200Z COORD...4293 7828 4304 7829 4305 7856 4297 7895 4281 7890 4260 7926 4261 7908 4268 7883 4282 7851 4285 7834 TIME Y22M12D17T1200Z-Y22M12D17T1800Z COORD...4298 7830 4306 7829 4310 7845 4308 7873 4303 7889 4309 7903 4300 7905 4283 7889 4266 7916 4279 7869 TIME Y22M12D17T1800Z-Y22M12D18T0000Z COORD...4276 7834 4291 7831 4296 7837 4297 7872 4294 7891 4279 7890 4253 7939 4257 7911 4258 7876 4270 7856 TIME Y22M12D18T0000Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z COORD...4267 7847 4273 7841 4281 7839 4283 7886 4239 7962 4237 7959 4256 7900 4254 7900 4254 7879 4256 7879 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D18T1200Z COORD...4250 7830 4262 7798 4284 7818 4285 7859 4277 7895 4232 7975 4199 7977 4222 7908 4226 7854 4237 7831 TIME Y22M12D18T1200Z-Y22M12D19T0000Z COORD...4265 7827 4276 7834 4274 7884 4238 7944 4227 7975 4201 7976 4215 7933 4228 7906 4222 7884 4236 7844 TIME Y22M12D19T0000Z-Y22M12D19T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
